review: Love it!  Get it if you don't have one.  I have a chromeCast which I love even more.  If you get this you may even consider dropping cable.
author: Dennis P. Uhlmann Jr.

review: Great for downloading apps and watching tv! I ordered one for every tv in my house :)
author: Cortney

review: I like it so far. Time will determine whether I like it or not.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Amazon did an amazing job with this device.  We have cut the cable.  Works with 2.4 and 5ghz WiFi (on 5ghz use a low channel).  My wife likes this WAY better than the Chromecast we started out with because of the remote.  Hulu & Netflix work great on this.
author: Amazon Customer

review: The first one they sent was defective, second on seems to work fine.
author: rick bentley
